root.name: Play The Industry
root.description: OverviewPlay The Industry was announced on September 4th, 2007. To this date, no new information on the game has come up. The game is being developed by Seth Green and Master P. In the game, players will be able to take on the role as a rapper, power agent or athlete. The September 4th, 2007 article stated that Seth Green was working on a script for the game and it was intended to be released some time in 2009. As of May 2011, no new news has been released and the project has presumably been canceled. Jeff and Ryan's betOn April 1st, 2008, Jeff Gerstmann and Ryan Davis placed a bet that if no new developments were announced before the end of the year other than a confirmation it was indeed cancelled, Ryan would pay Jeff ten dollars.Â On January 6, 2009, Ryan Davis payed Jeff.
